name: Haunted Mansion Solitaire
description:
On a secluded hillside
under a full moon
a mansion will dazzle you
and it will scare you soon.

With a ghost in every corner
or a spider in the room
you'll see a painting
but you'll really see a skull.

At least it has been set in motion
the best sorcerer in a milliard,
and with his special potion
made of enchanted cards
will disenchant this haunted mansion
flawlessly with an unparalleled passion,
and if you want to know who this person is,
look at the mirror, and then you'll see.

+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+

• 300 Levels
• Tripeaks Solitaire Style
• Lots of mission
• New things in every level
• If you don't want to be scared, you can dissable it in the option menu.

+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+
